summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3861 for the improvement of Halladay Street, from 4th Avenue North to Taylor Avenue produced from the south, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47251, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
